CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. C3, reads: "Photos of Your Pittsburgh Story Rally - Pledge of Allegiance - Shown above is the speakers' platform as the Rev. B. H. Logan directed the audience in Pledge of Allegiance to our flag."
TitMainTitle: Women and men standing on stage for pledge of allegiance, including Bill Nunn Sr., P. L. Prattis, Jessie Vann, Bishop Charles Foggie, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, and Jim Jordon, in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall for Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper's Appreciation Day Rally
